description:
Lighter, but not lightweights. The Keb Agile lives up to the iconic and hardwearing Keb trekking trousers name, they’re just a bit cooler, like the Keb with AC. Rugged pants that help you look great while trekking and climbing. Generous vents at the thighs offer great breathability when you work up a sweat. Articulated knees, tapered legs and stretchy material lend these pants to movement in the mountains, so if something were going to hold you back, it certainly wouldn’t be your pants.

  • Stretchy woven material blends recycled polyester with spandex
  • Hard-wearing G-1000® Lite panels at the knees and cuff add durability where you need it most
  • Zippered vents at the thigh and calf help keep you cool
  • Paneled construction reduces hot spots
  • 4 pockets help keep necessities close, zippered pockets keeps things safe
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Adjustable cuffs keep you ready for whatever your day brings
  • Regular fit for reliable comfort
name: Fjallraven Keb Agile Trousers - Men's
